description: Grafana PDF Report template having all categories

visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.Type as Type, sum(n.Count) as Count

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId}  RETURN distinct n.StoryTypes as StoryTypes ,toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.Duration))) as Duration

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId}  RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd','IST') as recordDate, n.Productivity as Productivity ORDER BY recordDate DESC limit 6

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd','IST') as recordDate , n.Bugs as Bugs,n.Vulnerablilities as Vulnerablilities,n.CodeSmell as CodeSmell ORDER BY n.executionId ASC limit 2

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.recordDateX as Time , n.Failure as Failure, n.Success as Success ORDER BY Time ASC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN   apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd','IST') as recordDate , n.Failure as Failure, n.Success as Success ORDER BY recordDate ASC limit 7

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Deploy , n.Deploy as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Builds, n.Builds as Value
